ai-iti98:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
ai-iti98:2.3_0: The better of these two gifts is the gift of the teaching.
ai-iti98:3.1_0: There are these two kinds of sharing.
ai-iti98:3.2_0: material things and sharing the teaching.
ai-iti98:3.3_0: The better of these two kinds of sharing is sharing the teaching.
ai-iti98:4.1_0: There are these two kinds of support.
ai-iti98:4.2_0: And they support in material things and support them.
ai-iti98:4.3_0: The better of these two kinds of support is support in the teaching.”
ai-iti98:5.1_0: “It is said to be the supreme, ultimate gift,
ai-iti98:5.2_0: and the sharing praised by the Buddha;
ai-iti98:5.3_0: what wise and sensible person, confident in the best of fields,
ai-iti98:5.4_0: would not sow a such timely gift?
ai-iti98:6.1_0: For those who are diligent in the dispensation of the Holy One,
ai-iti98:6.2_0: confident in the teaching of the Holy One,
ai-iti98:6.3_0: confident in the dispensation of the Holy One,
ai-iti98:6.4_0: such a gift purifies the highest goal.”
ai-iti98:7.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
